sentence: The beds are comfortable and the rooms are spacious
The TV apart from the high quality HD channels is connected to an Apple Mini and the wireless keyboard makes it very easy to use
The rooms as always super clean and extra big
The comfortable sunny sitting room had three large windows
The room was clean and comfortable
Great room and forgot an umbrella but they had some laying around
Bathroom stocked with Jonathan Alder items hair shampoo soap etc
Room was very nice breakfast was good staff very friendly
The bed was nice and they have a smart TV that you can use internet or record shows on a provided DVR
My husband and I have stayed at the Talbot a few times and are always pleased with the hotel and the rooms
I was excited too to discover the new rooms everything is great and never slept so well
Upon arriving they had us in a one bed room
The rooms had just been renovated so we were excited to see then
After a wait she said our room was ready
Oh by the way the modern gym is stuffed into a small basement converted supply closet with 7 foot celings

20 30 mins They have a small table set up in the morning with some complimentary coffee and tea The room was extremely spacious The beds were comfortable Staff was very friendlyCons Carpet in the room this is just a personal preference The bathroom seemed a bit dated There was a decent amount of sunlight that comes through even with shades down see photo
Dwayne helped us up to our room and could not have been friendlier
Our room was clean and comfortable and seemed particularly quiet due to it being a corner room
We really miss the old suites before renovation

The room was smaller as you had expect in a city and the view was not great from my room but the room was well appointed great linens comfy bed and the entire property was well maintained and up to date with a cozy boutique feel

This was my first stay at the Talbot since their refresh over a year ago and while I could not immediately identify what was done other than the great outdoor patio for al fresco dining and drinking I think that is new
Room was spacious for Chicago although the queen bed was tight for 2pl but we had lots of space to move around in the room
The suite had hotub in the bath tub so that was cool
They said they would send engineering to help with the TV engineering never came
Eager to asist need batteries for my mouse to work from my room and someone brought them right up
I was able to book two rooms at the Talbot hotel were we were treated like VIPs the entire stay
The staff was lovely and the room was spacious and comfortable
I loved the soap shampoo accessories that were in the bathroom and when we checked out asked to purchase the body lotion and shower gel
Bring your own beverage if choice and sit in the patio and share a cigar from their great selection
Very good and comfortable bed very large television
Very spacious bathroom with nice soaps

A special mention to Dwayne an ideal front of hotel man to welcome us and also to the lady who cleaned our room Room 1602 from Sep 25 until Oct 2 whose name I did not get soryA perfect location for getting around on foot literally a minutes walk from the Magnificent Mile and loads of bars and restaurants nearby
Location was nice and the room was very large
Room was clean and bed comfortable
Very nice room and Servicies

Positives Great location Pretty good value Comfortable bar area and relaxed ambience Welcoming stafNegatives Breakfast was included in the booking but instead we got a food credit each day off the hotel bill so be aware that if you do this you have to pay more to cover the cost No coffee or tea making facilities in the bedrom Bed in poor shape sunken in the middle and springy though we were able to change to a room with a slightly firmer matres A snipy receptionist on check out who wanted to charge our card before allowing us to see the bill then seemed offended that we would ask for it bizarre
